Prior Avastin allow Subject ChildPugh grade Class C hepatic impairment The subject proteinuria Common Toxicity Criteria ( CTC ) grade > 1 measure routine urinalysis 24 hour urine collection screen assessment Subject currently exhibit symptomatic persistent , uncontrolled hypertension define diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg systolic blood pressure > 150 mmHg .
